Rental & Service

All about bicycle can be found here!

  • Rental & Service
    • BicycleStation
    • Bicycle friendly accomodations
    • The harbor.mobile
    • ADFC Bremerhaven

In our cycle stations in the Shop Window Fishery Harbor and in the Havenwelten Bremerhaven we offer you full service, ranging from rentals to repairs, baggage  storage as well as touristic information.
